title: why are we buffing nidalee escapes?

embed.description: Hello, Summoners. Welcome to the official 5.2 patch notes! With a lot of our 2015 changes in the process of settling down, we realized we could finally tackle some longer-standing design challenges of the game. Like Deathfire Grasp (there it is).

body: the second biggest problem with pre rework {{champion:76}} is that she was impossible to catch... so why is riot making it so she can get over way thicker walls and from farther away? i dont mind that this will help her clear speed, but it just feels like they are slowly relapsing into what made {{champion:76}} so awful to deal with

replies.body: they over nerfed her during the following patches of her reworks. also she maybe hard to catch but she is not a team player, she throws one spear and hopes she hits someone before leaving.
Umm, she throws countless low mana cost, low cd spears and when one finally hits you, you're done.   What kinda Nidalee have you been watching?  Laning against her is almost as frustrating as Zed.
